mapper.select:
select sys_dict_id as id, parent_id as parentId, name as title, sort as order_num from sys_dict where del_flag = 0
and name like concat ('%',#{name},'%')
order by sort
select dic.* from sys_dict dic where dic.parent_id = ('"'+ #{hqls} +'"' ) and dic.del_flag = 0 order by dic.sort asc

select dic.* from sys_dict dic where dic.parent_id = ( SELECT d_second.sys_dict_id from sys_dict d_first left join sys_dict d_second on d_first.sys_dict_id = d_second.parent_id where d_first.parent_id = '#' and d_first.`name` = #{firstName} and d_second.name = #{secondName} and d_first.state = 0 and d_second.state = 0 ) and dic.del_flag = 0 and dic.state = 0 order by dic.sort asc
